statements: SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM access_control;
SELECT username, department FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'User' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, access_level FROM access_control WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'Admin' AND department = 'IT'
SELECT user_id, department FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'Manager' ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT username, password FROM access_control WHERE department = 'Finance'
SELECT * FROM access_control
SELECT id, role_id, user_id, permission FROM access_control WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions
SELECT id, permission FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 5
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role_id = 1 AND user_id = 5;
SELECT id, role_id, user_id, permission FROM access_control ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT role_id FROM access_control;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission) AS permission_count FROM access_control GROUP BY user_id HAVING permission_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT role, access_level FROM permissions WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT permission_description FROM permissions WHERE id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, access_time, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT role, permission_description FROM permissions ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT access_time, action FROM access_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.permission_id = permissions.id;
SELECT * FROM access_roles;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT permission_name, permission_description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id > 3;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM access_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_roles;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM access_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM access_roles WHERE role_description LIKE '%admin%');
SELECT permission_name, permission_description FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessControl WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, username FROM AccessControl WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM UserData WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM SecurityLogs WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, access_timestamp, accessed_resource FROM AccessHistory WHERE access_type = 'read' ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, role, access_level FROM AccessControl;
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM UserData ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM SecurityLogs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, access_timestamp, accessed_resource FROM AccessHistory WHERE access_type = 'READ' ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC;
